### Tender Notice

**Reference Number:** cb-6555-87212404
**Solicitation Number:** 23-58030
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-19
**Deadline:** 2023-07-18T14:00:00

**Title:** S77 Roof Replacement

The National Research Council Canada is soliciting proposals for the replacement of roofs sections 4 and 5 at Building S77 located at 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON.

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

This RFP is issued under the Unsolicited *Commercial and office building construction services* (72121100) category.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria are as follows:

- Technical rating: 40% (Evaluation of the contractor’s technical expertise, qualifications, and experience)
- Price rating: 60% (Evaluation of the tendered price)

### Mandatory Requirements

- The contractor must have a minimum of ten (10) years of experience in roofing projects and as a contractor providing comparable construction services.
- The contractor must supply a CV for the proposed construction site supervisor, site safety officer, and fire officer.
- The contractor must demonstrate membership in a recognized roofing association, and provide proof of certification.

### Mandatory Site Visit

A site visit is mandatory for all bidding contractors. The site visit will be held on June 27th and June 28th, 2023. Bidders who fail to attend the site visit will be considered non-responsive.

### Security Requirements

- The contractor must have a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC).
- All personnel working on the project must have a valid reliability status.

### Additional Requirements

- A valid Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB) certificate must be provided with the tender or prior to contract award.

### Procurement Documents

The procurement documents are available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca Tender Notice website. Addenda, if any, will be posted on the same website. Bidders must provide all information requested in the procurement documents to be considered responsive.
